programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Period epic starring Russell Crowe and Joaquin Phoenix. Rome, the second century AD: dying emperor Marcus Aurelius chooses the city's beloved general, Maximus Decimus Meridius, as his successor - a decision that results in a bitter power struggle with Aurelius's son Commodus, who sentences Maximus and his family to death. The general escapes, but he and Commodus are destined to meet again Ridley Scott - Director Ridley Scott - Director Russell Crowe - Maximus Decimus Meridius Joaquin Phoenix - Commodus Connie Nielsen - Lucilla Oliver Reed - Proximo Derek Jacobi - Gracchus Djimon Hounsou - Juba Richard Harris - Marcus Aurelius David Schofield - Falco John Shrapnel - Gaius Tomas Arana - Quintus David Hemmings - Cassius Ralf Moeller - Hagen Spencer Treat Clark - Lucius Tommy Flanagan - Cicero Sven Ole Thorson - Tigris Omid Djalili - Slave trader Russell Crowe - Maximus Decimus Meridius Joaquin Phoenix - Commodus Connie Nielsen - Lucilla Oliver Reed - Proximo Derek Jacobi - Gracchus Djimon Hounsou - Juba Richard Harris - Marcus Aurelius David Schofield - Falco John Shrapnel - Gaius Tomas Arana - Quintus David Hemmings - Cassius Ralf Moeller - Hagen Spencer Treat Clark - Lucius Tommy Flanagan - Cicero Sven Ole Thorson - Tigris Omid Djalili - Slave trader.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. The life of superhero John Hancock is on the skids; despite having saved countless lives, he's mostly remembered now for destroying property while flying around drunk. But after he rescues PR executive Ray Embrey from the path of a train, Hancock is offered the chance of repairing his tarnished image Peter Berg - Director Peter Berg - Director Will Smith - John Hancock Charlize Theron - Mary Embrey Jason Bateman - Ray Embrey Eddie Marsan - Red Johnny Galecki - Jeremy Will Smith - John Hancock Charlize Theron - Mary Embrey Jason Bateman - Ray Embrey Eddie Marsan - Red Johnny Galecki - Jeremy.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Romance, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2013 ║ 12
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams and Russell Crowe. In a far away galaxy, as the planet Krypton is about to explode, scientist Jor-El sends his baby son Kal to Earth. As he grows to manhood, Kal - under the human guise of Clark Kent - seeks to master his extraordinary powers and find out where he comes from. programme.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Animation, Family, Fantasy ║ 2022 ║ PG
programme.desc: Brooklyn plumbers Mario and Luigi are fixing a leak to a water main when they are transported down a mysterious pipe into a magical land. programme.title: Ted

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Action fantasy concluding Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy, starring Christian Bale, Tom Hardy and Anne Hathaway. So when talk-show host David Frost persuades Nixon to agree to a series of televised interviews, it is the perfect opportunity for the British TV star to make a name for himself. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. Romantic comedy, starring Rafe Spall and Zahra Newman Josh Lawson - Director, Josh Lawson - Director Rafe Spall - Teddy Zahra Newman - Leanne Ronny Chieng - Sam Dena Kaplan - Becka Noni Hazlehurst - The stranger Josh Lawson - Patrick Rafe Spall - Teddy Zahra Newman - Leanne Ronny Chieng - Sam Dena Kaplan - Becka Noni Hazlehurst - The stranger Josh Lawson - Patrick.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky in April 2024.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Riko and best friend Kane bungle the robbery of a local bank, causing one of the customers, hard man Leo Demarco, to suffer a heart attack. Fake news spreads that Leo is dead and Shotti, leader of one of East London's toughest firms, recruits Riko and Kane in gratitude for killing a rival. programme.title: S/Lge Hlts: Leeds v St Helens
programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos and St Helens meet in the Betfred Super League. Ash Handley was on hand again for the Rhinos previously, scoring the winner in a fiercely contested battle with Leigh. (15.03).

programme.title: S/Lge Hlts: Salford v Wigan
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Salford Red Devils face the champions Wigan Warriors. Salford had to come from behind in round four to secure a third successive win. (14.03).

programme.title: S/Lge Hlts: Hull KR v Hull FC
programme.desc: Hull KR host rivals Hull FC in round six of the Betfred Super League. The Robins bounced back from consecutive defeats by winning away from home at Huddersfield in round five. (29.03).

programme.title: Live S/Lge: Hull FC V Leeds
programme.desc: Hull FC host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. (28.04).

programme.title: S/Lge Hlts: St Helens v Wigan
programme.desc: St Helens play hosts to 2024's only unbeaten side Wigan Warriors in round six of the Betfred Super League. St Helens returned to winning ways against Leeds Rhinos last Friday. (29.03).

programme.title: S/Lge Hlts: Leeds v Warrington
programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. The Rhinos came out on top during last weekend's West Yorkshire derby, defeating neighbours Castleford Tigers. (05.04).

programme.title: S/Lge Hlts: Leigh v Wigan
programme.desc: Leigh Leopards host Wigan Warriors in the Betfred Super League. The Warriors' unbeaten run was ended in dramatic fashion last weekend at the Totally Wicked Stadium. (04.04).

programme.title: S/Lge: Leeds V Huddersfield Hlts
programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos and Huddersfield Giants clash in the Betfred Super League, with the visitors looking to continue their form and claim a third consecutive win. (19.04).

programme.title: S/Lge: Warrington V Leigh Hlts
programme.desc: Action from the Betfred Super League, as high-flying Warrington Wolves play host to a Leigh Leopards side with just one win to their name. (20.04).

programme.title: S/Lge Hlts: Salford v Wigan
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Salford Red Devils face the champions Wigan Warriors. Salford had to come from behind in round four to secure a third successive win. (14.03).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a game in week 10 of the 2023 NFL featuring the NFC North-leading Detroit Lions on the road to Los Angeles Chargers. (12.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights of a match-up from week one of the 2023 NFL season, as the Miami Dolphins travelled to Los Angeles Chargers. (10.09).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl bid on the line. (28.01).

programme.title: My Icon: Leon Pryce
programme.desc: Former Bradford Bulls and St Helens star Leon Pryce discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career.

programme.title: S/Lge: Hull FC v Leeds
programme.desc: Hull FC host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. In the absence of their departed head coach Tony Smith, a youthful Hull FC were put to the sword by St Helens in round eight. (28.04).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The 5-4 Buffalo Bills host the 3-5 Denver Broncos in week 10 of the 2023 NFL season. The Broncos enjoyed a bye week following their win over the reigning Super Bowl champions. (13.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The Las Vegas Raiders host the New York Jets in week 10 of the season. After firing their coach and GM, Antonio Pierce took interim charge to lead the Raiders to week nine victory. (12.11).

programme.title: Fight Night: Shields v Marshall
programme.desc: Long-standing rivals Claressa Shields and Savannah Marshall settle their scores as the two fight to become undisputed middleweight world champion at The O2. (15.10).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Dicaire
programme.desc: Natasha Jonas and Marie-Eve Dicaire go head to head in a super welterweight world title unification bout at the AO Arena in Manchester. (12.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: A game from week 10 of the 2023 NFL featuring the NFC North-leading Detroit Lions on the road to Los Angeles Chargers. The Charges began the week by rolling past the New York Jets. (12.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: GEHA Field at Arrowhead Stadium stages week 11 action from the 2023 NFL, as the reigning champions host Jalen Hurts' 8-1 Philadelphia Eagles in a Monday night Super Bowl rematch. (20.11).

programme.title: PL Darts: Liverpool
programme.desc: The BetMGM Premier League continues during 2024 with night 13 in Liverpool, as Nathan Aspinall enters M&S Bank Arena the latest nightly winner, toppling Michael Smith last week. (25.04).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from an NFC divisional round matchup, as the Detroit Lions host the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. The Lions haven't won multiple playoff games since 1957. (21.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The Dallas Cowboys meet the Philadelphia Eagles during week 14 of the 2023 NFL season. Previously, the Cowboys defeated the Seattle Seahawks to extend their winning run to four. (10.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24

programme.desc: Arsenal v Chelsea (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the top-flight match from Emirates Stadium. The reverse fixture back in October saw the Gunners come from 2-0 down to take a point from Stamford Bridge in a pulsating 2-2 draw.
